title: spack doesn't seem to respect compiler specification
body:
Spack does not seem to respect compiler specification. The install specification is for **intel@17.0.4**, but spack installs against **intel@17.0.1**. ``` spack install --d parmetis^metis+int64 % intel@17.0.4 ^ openmpi@2.1.1 ==> Installing util-macros ==> Fetching https://www.x.org/archive/individual/util/util-macros-1.19.1.tar.bz2 ######################################################################## 100.0% ==> Staging archive: /yellow/usr/projects/draco/vendors/spack.sn.experimental/spack.sn.c8df92760743e9b31bc49620ba4cc6bb8aedd867/var/spack/stage/util-macros-1.19.1-lzdm7dlkrwroyp2t43xgg5eutmtsupv2/util-macros-1.19.1.tar.bz2 ==> Created stage in /yellow/usr/projects/draco/vendors/spack.sn.experimental/spack.sn.c8df92760743e9b31bc49620ba4cc6bb8aedd867/var/spack/stage/util-macros-1.19.1-lzdm7dlkrwroyp2t43xgg5eutmtsupv2 ==> No patches needed for util-macros ==> Building util-macros [AutotoolsPackage] ==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf' ==> Executing phase: 'configure' ==> Executing phase: 'build' ==> Executing phase: 'install' ==> Successfully installed util-macros Fetch: 0.68s. Build: 1.35s. Total: 2.04s. [+] /yellow/usr/projects/draco/vendors/spack.sn.experimental/spack.sn.c8df92760743e9b31bc49620ba4cc6bb8aedd867/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/intel-17.0.1/util-macros-1.19.1-lzdm7dlkrwroyp2t43xgg5eutmtsupv2 ``` Can somebody please look at this? [compilers.yaml.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1354250/compilers.yaml.txt) [packages.yaml.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1354258/packages.yaml.txt)

Further debugging: metis@4.0.3 functions as expected

After editing `compilers.yaml` to remove `intel@17.0.1`, the compiler set is ``` ==> Available compilers -- gcc rhel7-x86_64 --------------------------------------------- gcc@5.3.0 gcc@4.8.5 -- intel rhel7-x86_64 ------------------------------------------- intel@17.0.4 ``` The most recent versions of `metis` are tested. ``` spack install --fake metis @ 5.1.0 % intel@17.0.4 ==> Error: No compilers with spec intel@17.0.1 found ``` ``` spack install --fake metis @ 5.0.2 % intel@17.0.4 ==> Error: No compilers with spec intel@17.0.1 found ``` ``` spack install --fake metis @ 4.0.3 % intel@17.0.4 ==> Installing metis ==> Building metis [Package] ==> Successfully installed metis Fetch: . Build: 0.11s. Total: 0.11s. [+] /yellow/usr/projects/draco/vendors/spack.sn.experimental/spack.sn.554937780bf9bad2e1e2b238aa95c6fd862b711e/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/intel-17.0.4/metis-4.0.3-3gsh64ekk4jotbmsd3iefszb62jzp7rd ```
